story.text: Much. of education, particularly higher or elite education is focussed on creativity. Much of the motivation of the best teachers, and reformers in education are motivated to provide these opportunities without discrimination to everyone. What can be wrong with that?

It is a habit worth cultivating to look at any statement that you endorse, and ask whether it reflects your best qualities. If it does then perhaps you are overlooking the other. The other may have different values.

Innovators value creativity. They see themselves as creative. If they are good innovators then they are creative individuals. In writing an educational manifesto, you would expect an innovator to emphasise their own personal qualities, and perhaps. overlook those actually wanted and needed by the learners themselves.
